>> walsh_test
16-Mar-2011 14:33:55

WALSH_TEST
  MATLAB version.
  Test the WALSH library.

WALSH_TEST01
  FWT computes a fast Walsh transform.

     I        X(I)    Y=FWT(X)/N   Z=FWT(Y)/N

WALSH_TEST03
  HAAR computes a Haar transform.
  HNORM normalizes the transformed data.
  HAARIN computes an inverse Haar transform.

     I        X(I)    Y=HAAR(X)  Z=HNORM(Y)  W=HAARIN(Z)

     1    0.218418    6.559067    0.409942    0.218418
     2    0.956318    0.270735    0.016921    0.956318
     3    0.829509    1.716980    0.214623    0.829509
     4    0.561695   -0.766044   -0.095756    0.561695
     5    0.415307   -0.216469   -0.054117    0.415307
     6    0.066119    0.113891    0.028473    0.066119
     7    0.257578    0.166529    0.041632    0.257578
     8    0.109957    0.356854    0.089214    0.109957
     9    0.043829   -0.737899   -0.368950    0.043829
    10    0.633966    0.267814    0.133907    0.633966
    11    0.061727    0.349188    0.174594    0.061727
    12    0.449539    0.147621    0.073810    0.449539
    13    0.401306   -0.590137   -0.295068    0.401306
    14    0.754673   -0.387812   -0.193906    0.754673
    15    0.797287   -0.353367   -0.176684    0.797287
    16    0.001838    0.795449    0.397724    0.001838

     I        X(I)    Y=HAAR(X)  Z=HNORM(Y)  W=HAARIN(Z)

WALSH_TEST04
